An application was given to the Mamlatdar office, Mahuwa to get a certified copy of his birth certificate but he replied his letter No. 292/90-91 dated 14-2-'91 9 that his birth was not recorded in the birth & death register of village-Zervavra, Tal. Mahuwa for the year- 1913, no certified copy of his birth certificate was available and hence I have to make an affidavit so I- - ..2.
